actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide resettlement and humanitarian assistance to refugees from Indochina.
short_title: Indochina Resettlement and Humanitarian Assistance Act

summary.text: Indochina Resettlement and Humanitarian Assistance Act - Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary for (1) assistance to States; (2) transportation to other countries; and (3) health, educational, and employment services in assisting the resettlement of refugees from South Vietnam and Cambodia who cannot return to such countries because of the danger of persecution for their race, religious, or political opinions.

titles.title: Indochina Resettlement and Humanitarian Assistance Act
A bill to provide resettlement and humanitarian assistance to refugees from Indochina.
